price: 55. Fadhi sharfeed run ah oo (Allaah) Boqorka Awooda wax walba agtiisa ah.
arabic: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fī maqʿadi ṣid'qin ʿinda malīkin muq'tadirin
